name: Save The Zombies
description:
Save the Zombies

Save the Zombies is about curing enemies of a virus causing them to have violent outbursts. The goal is to lead the enemies into the medical tent, where they will be cured of the infectious disease. Once enemies are cured, they become allies and help you achieve your goal of saving or neutralising the hoard. 

Controls:

W key - move

Click - shoot 

This game was made for the Wowie! Jam 4.0 and is not completed to the game concept's full potential, however, the game jam proved to be a great learning opportunity. 

Game Credits

Lead Programmer: Zoe Last - https://zoiecollege.wixsite.com/zoe-last-portfolio

Lead Artist: Adam Killick - https://akillick99.wixsite.com/portfolio
